snippet: The FiveThirtyEight model represents a complicated analysis of the polls, but simplicity is on its side in finding that President Obama is the Electoral College favorite.
abstract: The FiveThirtyEight model represents a complicated analysis of the polls, but simplicity is on its side in finding that President Obama is the Electoral College favorite.

headline.main: Nov. 1: The Simple Case for Saying Obama Is the Favorite
headline.print_headline: Simple Case For Saying That Obama Is Favored
